amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 609 of the bill that provided for reducing the minimum waiting period that banks must wait before completing a proposed merger from 15 days to 5 days.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-439 to strike section 609 of the bill. Section 609 reduces the minimum waiting period from 15 calendar days to 5 calendar days for banks and bank holding companies to merge with or acquire other banks or bank holding companies after the Department of Justice has approved a bank merger. The amendment also preserves the existing 15 calendar day waiting period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
